title: Item Behavior Document
description: A behavior pack item definition document for Minecraft Bedrock Edition. This describes the complete JSON file structure including format_version and the minecraft:item wrapper. Items define the properties, components, and behaviors of custom items that can be obtained and used by players.

fields.title: Format Version
fields.description: The format version of this item behavior file. Determines which features and component schemas are available. Use '1.20.20' or later for the latest item component system.

fields.title: Item Definition
fields.description: The item definition container with description and components sections.

fields.title: Description
fields.description: Contains the item's unique identifier and optional menu category placement.

fields.title: Components
fields.description: The components that define this item's behavior, appearance, and interactions.
